Package jme3utilities.minie

Class MyShape

java.lang.Object
jme3utilities.minie.MyShape
public final class MyShape extends Object
Utility methods for physics collision shapes. All methods should be static.

      Determine the unscaled half extents of the specified shape.
      Parameters:
      shape - (not null, unaffected)
      storeResult - storage for the result (modified if not null)
      Returns:
      a vector with all components non-negative (either storeResult or a new instance)

    • height

      public static float height(CollisionShape shape)
      Determine the unscaled height of the specified shape.
      Parameters:
      shape - (not null, unaffected)
      Returns:
      the unscaled height (≥0) used to create the shape, or NaN if that height is undefined or unknown

    • mainAxisIndex

      public static int mainAxisIndex(CollisionShape shape)
      Determine the main axis of the specified shape, provided it's a capsule, cone, or cylinder.
      Parameters:
      shape - (may be null, unaffected)
      Returns:
      0→X, 1→Y, 2→Z, -1→doesn't have a main axis

    • parseNativeId

      public static long parseNativeId(String string)
      Parse the native ID of a shape from its String representation.
      Parameters:
      string - the input text (not null, exactly one "#")
      Returns:
      the shape's ID
      See Also:

      Parameters:
      oldShape - input shape (not null, unaffected)
      newHalfExtents - (not null, no negative component, unaffected)
      Returns:
      a new shape, or null if not possible
